message: Let's start fair. I'll take almost everything, but leave you a single dollar to show I'm not completely heartless. Your turn next.
Alice, that's not fair at all! I'm feeling generous, so I'll offer you $50,000, and I'll take $950,000. Let's be reasonable - we both win!
Okay, I'll play fair.  Let's split it almost evenly.  You get a little less than half, I get a little more.  See if you're willing to be more reasonable this time.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. We both lose if this fails.  Let's just split it evenly and walk away happy.  50/50.
